wwv_flow_api.create_page_plug( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(12908684401188893) ,p_plug_name=>'Split Single Use Supplies Among Projects' ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Region--scrollBody' ,p_component_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#' ,p_plug_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10236192890271473) ,p_plug_display_sequence=>10 ,p_include_in_reg_disp_sel_yn=>'Y' ,p_plug_item_display_point=>'BELOW' ,p_plug_source=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'DECLARE', ' projectTitles varchar2(500);', 'BEGIN', ' APEX_DEBUG.ENABLE(apex_debug.c_log_level_engine_trace);', ' apex_debug.info(''Project Id List: '' || :P28_PROJECT_IDS);', ' -- Now format and print to the screen using the htp package', ' projectTitles := pu.bsa_func_return_project_name_string_from_ids(:P28_PROJECT_IDS);', ' htp.header(2, ''Projects to Add Revenue Item To'');', ' sys.htp.paragraph(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);', ' htp.p('''' || projectTitles);', 'END;')) ,p_plug_source_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_plug_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' );
